Question.Subject: would someone give me some information about migratory birds in punjab ?
Question.Content: actually i have an project on it so please give meas much as you have information about migratory birds in punjab

ChosenAnswer: I don't know about birding in that part of the world but you might possibly find help at this site: http://www.wildlifeofpakistan.com/PakistanBirdClub/index.html
